com.example.happypuzzle

Class DatabaseTableContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.happypuzzle.DatabaseTableContainer

  • public class DatabaseTableContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple container for a single table in SQLite for storing ResultTuples. Each row is represented by DbItem object.
    Author:
    Team HappyPuzzle
